author: Nintendo of America
description:
Power up on the go when DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO launches on Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch on Nov 14. Pre-order now: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/dragon-ball-sparking-zero-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01   

Unleash a Kamehameha with your own hands! Discover the unique ways to play on Nintendo Switch 2 & Nintendo Switch, including the new motion controls! 


#DRAGONBALL #SparklingZERO #NintendoSwitch #NintendoSwitch2 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot
